sentences.en: Conclusion The genesis of PLC was by multiple factors.
sentences.cn: 结论原发性肝癌的发生是多因素的.

sentences.en: Creole Genesis: The Haitian case. What's to be explained?
sentences.cn: 克理奥尔语的起源: 海地的例子. 从中解释 什么 ?

sentences.en: For the genesis of its ideas mathematics gradually turned from the sensory to the intellectual faculties.
sentences.cn: 由于数学概念的起源,使它逐渐从感觉的学科转向思维的学科.

sentences.en: Genesis recorded a song which took a swipe at greedy property developers who bought up and demolished people's homes.
sentences.cn: 吉妮西丝录制了一首歌来抨击那些买下并毁坏人们家园的贪婪的房地产开发商。

sentences.en: In Genesis, Jesus is the Ram at Abraham's alter.
sentences.cn: 在创世纪, 耶稣是亚伯拉罕祭坛上的公羊.

sentences.en: Laboriously did he describe the genesis of the picnic.
sentences.cn: 他熬费苦心地描绘了这次野餐的根由.

sentences.en: Life's transition from the sea to the land was perhaps as much of an evolutionary challenge as was the genesis of life.
sentences.cn: 这句话的意思是说，“（如果说）生命的起源是个进化的挑战（的话），（那么）生命从海洋到陆地的演变是个更大程度的进化挑战。”

sentences.en: Objective : To Study the genesis and the development of salivary gland tumor ( SGT ).
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究涎腺肿瘤的发生和发展规律,建立 涎 腺肿瘤动物模型.

sentences.en: The Bible begins with the Genesis.
The Bible commences with the Genesis.
The Book of Genesis contains little information on the garden itself.
sentences.cn: 〈创世纪〉包括了少许有关这个花园本身的信息.

sentences.en: The project had its genesis two years earlier.
sentences.cn: 该项目是两年前开始的。

sentences.en: These effects are of considerable importance in the genesis of a number of important arrhythmias.
sentences.cn: 这些效应在某些重要的心律失常的发生上有相当重要的意义.

sentences.en: This refers to the genesis and function of consciousness and language.
sentences.cn: 这里指的是意识,和语言的起源及功能。

sentences.en: To study the genesis, pathogeny and prevention of empty nose syndrome.
sentences.cn: 目的:探讨空鼻综合征的发生 、 发病机理及防治措施.

sentences.en: We can not yet satisfactorily explain the genesis of the university.
sentences.cn: 我们还不能满意地解释宇宙的起源.

sentences.en: We cannot yet satisfactorily explain the genesis of the universe.
sentences.cn: 我们仍不能令人满意地解释宇宙的起源.

trans.tran_en: the beginning or origin of something
